    Description

  • Uses of JoltFile in ca.jolt.http

    Methods in ca.jolt.http that return JoltFile
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JoltFile
    Response.file()
    Converts the response body into a JoltFile, using the content type and filename from the response headers when available.

    Method
    Description
    List<JoltFile>
    JoltContext.getFiles()
